values:
Things you enjoy, even when no one around you wants to go out and play. What lowers your stress/blood pressure/anxiety level? Make a list, post it to your journal... and then tag 5 friends and ask them to post it to theirs.

1) Candle-lit bubble bath with a cup of tea or cocoa and some soothing musica.

2) Walking in the rain...just for getting wet sake.

3) Making CD's for people I know...I take great pride in my mixology.

4) Taking pictures, it truley has become a passion of mine.

5) A nice big bottle of red[pinor noir or something from georges deboeuf]...and a block of havarti with dill.

6) Michigan Avenue or Halsted. Both great for shopping but more importantly people watching.

I tag...
